=== The UbuCon New York Registration List ===
'''Registration closes at 5 PM Eastern time on Wednesday, February 14, 2007.'''  '''

''All guests must be pre-registered with building security in order to be admitted to Google NYC; you will also be required to show a photo identification to security in order to gain admittance.  If you have not registered by the cut off time, we may not be able to get you registered with building security and you may not be admitted to the Ubucon NYC.''

''Please list your full name and email address below so we can get you registered.''

The UbuCon will take place at the new <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=l&hl=en&q=google&near=New+York,+NY&ie=UTF8&z=15&ll=40.74196,-74.00465&spn=0.015542,0.040169&om=1&iwloc=A|Google offices in New York City]]</nowiki> on Friday, February 16.
